'''Notes'''
The exact model of this laptop is 257SA0. This is a quite old but high end dual core laptop. As I didn't have option to permanently install Ubuntu on it, I just run tests from CD. It doesn't have option to boot from USB in BIOS. During my tests I couldn't make WIFI or SD card reader to work. WIFI is "Intersil Corporation ISL3886 [Prism Javelin/Prism Xbow] (rev 01)" .Also suspend didn't work at all. Screen functionality and resolution seems to be fine.
